sqlMap.select:
SELECT toolholderid, sapcode, name, toolholdertype, brandid, (select name from brand where brandid = a.brandid) as brandname, turningtype, portsize, handoftool, figure, figure2, featurecode, cseries, length, width, bore, thheadangle, aname1, atype1, aname2, atype2, aname3, atype3, aname4, atype4, aname5, atype5, remark FROM toolholder a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.name = #name#
a.toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#
a.brandid = #brandid#
a.turningtype = #turningtype#
a.portsize = #portsize#
a.handoftool = #handoftool#
a.figure = #figure#
a.figure2 = #figure2#
a.featurecode = #featurecode#
a.cseries = #cseries#
a.length = #length#
a.width = #width#
a.bore = #bore#
a.thheadangle = #thheadangle#
a.aname1 = #aname1#
a.atype1 = #atype1#
a.aname2 = #aname2#
a.atype2 = #atype2#
a.aname3 = #aname3#
a.atype3 = #atype3#
a.aname4 = #aname4#
a.atype4 = #atype4#
a.aname5 = #aname5#
a.atype5 = #atype5#
a.remark = #remark#
(a.toolholdertype like '%$keyword$%' or a.portsize like '%$keyword$%' or a.handoftool like '%$keyword$%')
order by a.toolholderid desc

SELECT count(1) as count FROM toolholder a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.name = #name#
a.toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#
a.brandid = #brandid#
a.turningtype = #turningtype#
a.portsize = #portsize#
a.handoftool = #handoftool#
a.figure = #figure#
a.figure2 = #figure2#
a.featurecode = #featurecode#
a.cseries = #cseries#
a.length = #length#
a.width = #width#
a.bore = #bore#
a.thheadangle = #thheadangle#
a.aname1 = #aname1#
a.atype1 = #atype1#
a.aname2 = #aname2#
a.atype2 = #atype2#
a.aname3 = #aname3#
a.atype3 = #atype3#
a.aname4 = #aname4#
a.atype4 = #atype4#
a.aname5 = #aname5#
a.atype5 = #atype5#
a.remark = #remark#
(a.toolholdertype like '%$keyword$%' or a.portsize like '%$keyword$%' or a.handoftool like '%$keyword$%')
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO toolholder (toolholderid, sapcode, name, toolholdertype, brandid, turningtype, portsize, handoftool, figure, figure2, featurecode, cseries, length, width, bore, thheadangle, aname1, atype1, aname2, atype2, aname3, atype3, aname4, atype4, aname5, atype5, remark) VALUES (#toolholderid#, #sapcode#, #name#, #toolholdertype#, #brandid#, #turningtype#, #portsize#, #handoftool#, #figure#, #figure2#, #featurecode#, #cseries#, #length#, #width#, #bore#, #thheadangle#, #aname1#, #atype1#, #aname2#, #atype2#, #aname3#, #atype3#, #aname4#, #atype4#, #aname5#, #atype5#, #remark#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Toolholder set
sapcode = #sapcode#,
name = #name#,
toolholdertype = #toolholdertype#,
brandid = #brandid#,
turningtype = #turningtype#,
portsize = #portsize#,
handoftool = #handoftool#,
featurecode = #featurecode#,
cseries = #cseries#,
length = #length#,
width = #width#,
bore = #bore#,
thheadangle = #thheadangle#,
aname1 = #aname1#,
atype1 = #atype1#,
aname2 = #aname2#,
atype2 = #atype2#,
aname3 = #aname3#,
atype3 = #atype3#,
aname4 = #aname4#,
atype4 = #atype4#,
aname5 = #aname5#,
atype5 = #atype5#,
remark = #remark#
figure = #figure#
figure2 = #figure2#
WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
update Machinetoolholder set toolholderid = null WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
update Bladetoolholder set toolholderid = null WHERE toolholderid = #toolholderid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT brandid as value, name as text FROM brand
SELECT count(toolholderid) as count FROM toolholder where toolholdertype = #toolholdertype# and brandid = #brandid#
SELECT figure, figure2 FROM toolholder where toolholderid = #toolholderid#
